tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ModelTextures (
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    texture_id UUID NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (model_id, texture_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES ObjectModels(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (texture_id) REFERENCES Textures(id)
);

CREATE TABLE model_textures (
  model_texture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT NOT NULL,
  texture_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (model_id, texture_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (texture_id) REFERENCES textures(texture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ModelTextures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    texture_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES ObjectModels(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (texture_id) REFERENCES Textures(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ModelMetadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    creator VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TextureMetadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    texture_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    creator VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);
